channel.title: Star Wars Day Extravaganza: Scum and Villainy: Episode I: CHILDREN OF THE REBELLION
channel.description:
on 4th of may this year i'll be running three sessions of Scum and Villainy in the Star Wars setting.
When i announced the games i asked players to sign up for one session initially with all the remaining places opening up on the 17th.
The 17th is here and i have one player space left for the morning session.
The game will be run using Roll20. The game will run for 3 hours and use pre-generated characters.
Star Wars Day Extravaganza: Scum and Villainy: Episode I: CHILDREN OF THE REBELLION Saturday, May 4th 2019, [date=2019-05-04 time=10:00:00 timezone="Europe/London"]: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LbT3M0GFkjRwqTvuljh
